    Foreach(
        ForeachLoop {
            foreach: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            iterator: Parenthesized {
                left_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    9,
                ),
                inner: Value {
                    expression: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    10,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    as: Span(
                        3,
                        13,
                    ),

                            3,
                            16,
                        ),

                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    17,
                                ),
                                name: "b",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                },
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    3,
                    19,

            body: Braced(

                    left_brace: Span(
                        3,
                        21,
                    ),
                    inner: [],
                    right_brace: Span(
                        3,
                        22,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        },

            foreach: Span(

                    expression: Variable(

                                span: Span(

                    ),
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
    Switch {
        condition: Parenthesized {
            left_parenthesis: Span(
                7,
                8,
            ),
            inner: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            7,
                            9,
                        ),
                        name: "a",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            right_parenthesis: Span(
                7,
                11,
            ),
        },
        cases: [
            Case {
                condition: Some(
                    LiteralInteger {
                        span: Span(
                            8,
                            10,
                        ),
                        value: "0",
                    },
                ),
                body: [
                    Break {
                        break: Span(
                            9,
                            9,
                        ),
                        expression: None,
                        semicolon: Span(
                            9,
                            14,
                        ),
                    },
                ],
            },
            Case {
                condition: Some(
                    LiteralInteger {
                        span: Span(
                            10,
                            10,
                        ),
                        value: "1",
                    },
                ),
                body: [],
            },
            Case {
                condition: None,
                body: [],
            },
        ],
    },
    Foreach(

            foreach: Span(

                1,
            ),

                                name: "foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    as: Span(
                        14,
                        15,
                    ),
                    ampersand: None,
                    value: ShortArray(
                        Bracketed {
                            left_bracket: Span(
                                14,
                                18,
                            ),
                            inner: CommaSeparated {
                                inner: [
                                    ArrayItem {
                                        key: None,
                                        value: Variable(
                                            SimpleVariable(
                                                SimpleVariable {
                                                    span: Span(
                                                        14,
                                                        19,
                                                    ),
                                                    name: "baz",
                                                },
                                            ),
                                        ),
                                        unpack: false,
                                        by_ref: false,

                                        key: None,

                                                    span: Span(
                                                        14,
                                                        25,
                                                    ),
                                                    name: "car",
                                                },
                                            ),
                                        ),
                                        unpack: false,
                                        by_ref: false,
                                    },
                                ],
                                commas: [
                                    Span(
                                        14,
                                        23,
                                    ),
                                ],
                            },
                            right_bracket: Span(
                                14,
                                29,
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                },
                right_parenthesis: Span(
                    14,
